page.title: 15THE SMYTH FAMILY
page.content: {ASHTON COURT }was the {SMYTH}family home.They were a wealthy family who owned a lot of land in this area.The { {SMYTHS }donated a park to{BEDMINSTER {,SOUTHVILLE}area which is called {DAME {EMILY SMYTH}play park .This used to be a coal mine. Where the band stand is used to be a pit shaft.That was how the {SMYTHS}made their money by owning coal mines.The {Smyths }also donated{ {Greville Smyth park}to the {ASHTON } Area which used to be part of the grounds of {LADY SMYTHS .}One of the daughters called{Pat Smyth}used to do the show jumping .{Emily Smyth}also donated her house and grounds to the {CITY of BRISTOL .}The House almost became derelict but is now being refurbished .Some of it can be used for{exhibitions ,conferences }or{ {parties }.
